hamstring_stretches.name: Standing Hamstring Stretch
hamstring_stretches.description: Stand upright and extend one leg in front of you with the heel on the ground and toes pointing up. Keep the other leg straight with the foot flat on the ground. Hinge at the hips and lean forward until you feel a stretch in the back of the straight leg. Hold for 20-30 seconds and switch legs.

hamstring_stretches.name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
hamstring_stretches.description: Sit on the floor with one leg extended straight in front of you and the other leg bent with the foot against the inner thigh of the extended leg. Reach forward towards the toes of the extended leg until you feel a stretch in the hamstring. Hold for 20-30 seconds and switch legs.

hamstring_stretches.name: Standing Towel Hamstring Stretch
hamstring_stretches.description: Sit on the floor with your legs extended straight out in front of you. Loop a towel around one foot and hold onto the ends with both hands. Gently pull the towel towards you, keeping your back straight, until you feel a stretch in the hamstring. Hold for 20-30 seconds and switch legs.

hamstring_stretches.name: Lying Hamstring Stretch
hamstring_stretches.description: Lie on your back with one leg bent and the foot flat on the ground, and the other leg extended straight up towards the ceiling. Hold onto the back of the thigh of the extended leg and gently pull it towards you until you feel a stretch in the hamstring. Hold for 20-30 seconds and switch legs.

hamstring_stretches.name: Wall Hamstring Stretch
hamstring_stretches.description: Lie on your back with your hips close to a wall and extend both legs up against the wall. Keep your legs straight and flex your feet towards you until you feel a stretch in the hamstrings. Hold for 20-30 seconds.
